website_summaries.verdict: Stylish glass brewer is simple to use and easy to store.
pros: Fits easily inside refrigerator door and takes up minimal space
cons: Coffee grounds tend to pass through the filter if they are too fine

customer_reviews.title: impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tasting cold brew! I always drink my coffee iced in the summer and I needed a solution to watered down coffee and this product got the job done well. I followed the instructions included and left it in the refrigerator to brew for 14 hours. I took the filter out and poured myself a cup. The coffee was smooth, cold, and refreshing! Super impressed with the results and look forward to using it all the time. Product itself seems durable and don't forsee any problems coming up!
customer_reviews.author: J reviews things

customer_reviews.title: Very thin glass
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but the glass is shockingly thin. I would never consider putting this in the dishwasher. And I don't think this is good for homes with children.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisFree

customer_reviews.title: great aroma
customer_reviews.text: dont know how this works yet because it is a gift for my mom. I can say that it arrived right on time and the aroma is fantastic!! I want to break it out and make some for myself, and I am sure my mom will love it!

customer_reviews.title: Love this! The price was great and my cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The price was great and my cold brew tastes wonderful (even using Foldgers half-caff). I can't wait to try it with some high quality coffee. Customer service was quick and very helpful when I had a question. I hope they look into making larger sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful thing
customer_reviews.text: Using this cold-brew coffee maker is saving us a lot of money as my husband no longer goes OUT to get his iced coffee. It's so easy to use, fun to make and it looks beautiful sitting in our fridge full of rich-colored cold brew.
customer_reviews.author: K. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction 100%
customer_reviews.text: My BOCHA Brew came in two days ago and I'm already on my second brew. I'm impressed with how smooth the coffee is, needless to say, for my first cold brew carafe, this is amazing! One piece of advice: make sure you set your burr or coffee grind to the appropriate size, I neglected this fact on my first brew so I had to filter my coffee the next day but no big deal! 100% recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cold Brew!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping around for a cold brew coffee maker and this one does a geat job. The filter keeps finely grained coffee grounds without any excess getting into your coffee. The thin sleek design is not only aesthetic but also function in maintaining fridge space. I would highly recommend this high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product brews easy and fast just as the directions indicate. Easy clean up. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: HHH

customer_reviews.title: Super comvenient and great for summer!
customer_reviews.text: For any beginner coffee addicts, this neat cold brew fits all the new trends and comes with a handy instruction manual. Summer wouldn't be complete without this. Takes only a few minutes to prepare and let sit as it cold brews. You can't beat its convenience.

customer_reviews.title: Best product of the summer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cold brew carafe. It is easy to use and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, strong and makes a great cold brew!
customer_reviews.text: After being recommended to try blending my own cold brew, I had to try this guy out. Constructions come that are easy to follow (just a few steps) and come out with really great, chilled coffee. And the glass is not only sleek, but also extremely strong. I know this because I accidentally dropped it when cleaning and absolutely nothing happened. Don't try that, though haha :) In the end, a really solid piece for coffee lovers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad for Amazon's return policy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in little bitty pieces. I took this to mean it was too fragile to fulfill its function. Glad for Amazon's return policy, otherwise it would have been a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Book Listener

customer_reviews.title: Smooth beverage, minimal space and improved design
customer_reviews.text: Very effective - takes minimal refrigerator space and is well balanced. Cold-brewed tea definitely is smoother, and having two 32-ounce units allows a choice of different flavors - or even one coffee and one tea - on hand for serving cold or re-heating on a cold day (although we haven't made coffee in it yet). This is our second of these units and has an improved lid/infuser gasket system, with dual gaskets that don't need to be removed when you pull the infuser. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Builder50

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Delicious Cold Brew!
customer_reviews.text: I always wondered how cold brew was made and decided to get one of these to try it. I didn’t think it was possible to make good cold brew at home so I was a bit skeptical... I followed the instructions and waited overnight for the coffee to brew and it turned out tasting great! It matches the coffee shops cold brew and its much more convenient and less expensive. I would recommend this bad boy to anyone who enjoys their coffee cold and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Coffee! Great price, great taste, great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of making a pot of real smooth coffee in the Bocha infuser! I like my coffee hot so I just pop a cup of infused coffee into the micro for 110 sec and voila! a perfect cup of smooth, fresh, coffee. The coffe is not burnt because I do know my micro oven and the coffee has not reached 212 degrees. I would buy this affordable coffee again and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene  MF

customer_reviews.title: great tea!
customer_reviews.text: i use it for ice tea...2 family size tea bags in the infuser....then add your preferred sweetner, after about 15 minutes (take out the infusser)...and, great tea!!!!! a good friend had one, and i coudn't order mine fast enough......LOVE IT !!!

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and clean and is really tastes delicious
